About Us

We are a small product-focused team that has built engineering tools relied upon by over 110,000 registered engineers to build their products more quickly. Whether itâ€™s drones, airplanes, medical devices, and lots more, we break down the barriers in bringing new products to life.

We are currently looking for an experienced software engineer who can also help manage and mentor junior developers and bring greater maturity to our product and processes.

You can see more details and apply here: https://snapeda.workable.com/j/9CF0237921
